'''1.11.2''' is a hotfix to {{el|be}} released only for Xbox One on May 2, 2019. It is compatible with 1.11.0 and 1.11.1 servers.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360027611172-Minecraft-1-11-2-Xbox-One-Only-|title=Minecraft - 1.11.2 (Xbox One Only)|date=May 2, 2019}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Fixed the Village & Pillage menu panorama not appearing.
* Fixed the "Something went wrong" error that occurred when attempting to purchase content or Realms.
